scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach -pitv -j unlimited run build
scripts.dev: yarn workspaces foreach -piv -j unlimited run dev & yarn rw dev web & yarn start-python-formatter-server
scripts.dev-without-python-formatter-server: yarn workspaces foreach -piv -j unlimited run dev & yarn rw dev web
scripts.test: yarn build && yarn rw build api && ./node_modules/.bin/ts-node --project scripts/tsconfig.json scripts/test.ts
